content: Organizations that must adhere to HUD's latest HMIS updates for Comparable Databases are required to use our Apricot for Homeless Services product. As HUD publishes a set of requirements for Comparable Databases, vendors are not individually certified by HUD as compliant. Vendors have also been notified that submission exceptions can be provided to organizations who need to report on data from comparable databases. For more information please reach out to HUD for Technical Assistance.For questions about our Apricot for Homeless Services product, please feel free to reach out to your Account Manager. Click here for more information on how to contact your Account Manager.
title: HMIS Comparable Database Requirements
